        Creates a deck with convenient arguments.
        Parameters:
        request - A request that specifies the contents of the deck either as card IDs or inventory IDs.

                                                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Processes a command to add or remove cards from a deck.
        Parameters:
        request - A possibly complex deck update command for a given user and deck ID.
        Returns:
        A non-null value if the deck was successfully updated.

        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution

      • deleteDeck

        static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.DeckDeleteResponse deleteDeck(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.DeckDeleteRequest request)
                                                                  throws com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Trashes a deck. When a deck is in the trash, it will not appear in the user's account but it will still exist for analytics purposes.
        Parameters:
        request - The deck to delete.
        Returns:
        The result of trashing the deck.
        Throws:
        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException
